Member Function Documentation

bool LineContentAssistWidget::tryHandleKey ( QKeyEvent *  e  ) 

Tries to handle the given key press fully, committing the selection if possible.

Returns:
True, if the key was handle fully and the editor should not handle it. False, if the editor still needs to handle the key.
Remarks:
Assumes that the given key event has not yet been handled by the editor.

void LineContentAssistWidget::updateMatches (  )  [private]

Tries to match the contents to the text close to the text cursor. If there is a match, the content assist is automatically shown. Otherwise it is hidden.

Definition at line 199 of file LineContentAssistWidget.cpp.

bool LineContentAssistWidget::canCommitWith ( QKeyEvent *  e  )  const [private]

Returns true if the content assist can currently commit with the given key.

Parameters:
[in] key The commit key.
Returns:
True, if the content assist can currently commit.

void LineContentAssistWidget::commitSelection (  )  [private]

Commits the selection with the contents from the content assist.

Remarks:
Assumes that there is at least a partial match found when match() was called the previous time.
